Title: Tar: Denial of service
Synopsis: A vulnerability in Tar could led to a Denial of Service condition.

Background.Text: The Tar program provides the ability to create and manipulate tar archives.

Description.Text: The sparse_dump_region function in sparse.c file in Tar allows an infinite loop using the --sparse option.

Impact.Text: A local attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition by modifying a file that is supposed to be archived by a different userâ€™s process (e.g., a system backup running as root).

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All Tar users should upgrade to the latest version:
